content: SP Entity Id (link to metadata XML)

comment.text: This translation key is used for the label and tooltip of a field that displays a link to an entity's metadata XML in a Single Sign-On (SSO) provider settings page. The text appears as a button label in a PortalSettings categories integration setting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "لغة التوصيف الموسعة" (language description extended) is a very literal and overly technical translation of "metadata". It's not how this term is commonly understood in a Saudi Arabian context. It's too complex for the intended audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: معرف كيان SP (رابط إلى ملف البيانات الوصفية)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses and the term 'رابط' within them makes the phrase feel slightly awkward. Consider streamlining.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: معرف كيان SP (رابط لملف البيانات الوصفية)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Müəssisə” translates more accurately to 'Organization' or 'Institution' rather than 'Enterprise' in this context. 'Enterprise' implies a larger, more complex entity. 'Organization' or 'Institution' better represents 'SP' which often refers to a service provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Təşkilat identifikatoru (metada XML üçün keçid)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'keçid' is acceptable, but 'bağlantı' might be a more natural and common choice for 'link' in Azerbaijani in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Təşkilat identifikatoru (metada XML üçün bağlantı)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Идентификация на обекта на доставчика на услуги' is overly literal and doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'SP Entity Id'. 'SP Entity Id' refers to a specific identifier, not just the identification of an object.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation like 'ИД на доставчика на услуги' or 'Идентификатор на доставчика на услуги'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'връзка към XML метаданни' could be more concisely stated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'линк към XML метаданни' or 'препратка към XML метаданни'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'μεταδεδομένων' is spelled incorrectly. It should be 'μεταδεδομένων'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: μεταδεδομένων

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a period after 'Id' which isn't present in the English source. While not strictly incorrect, it deviates from the original format and could be inconsistent with other translations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the period after 'Id' to match the English source: 'Id de entidad SP (enlace al XML de metadatos)'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the parentheses after "Id entité SP". The original English contains '(link to metadata XML)' which indicates a specific format/content should be present.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Id entité SP (lien vers les métadonnées XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'անձի' (anzi) translates more accurately as 'entity's' or 'individual's' rather than just 'of'. It implies ownership or belonging. While understandable, it's slightly less precise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP entity (հղում դեպի մետատվյալներ XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the parentheses are correct, consider whether they should be consistently used throughout the document if other similar terms also use parentheses.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP entity ID (link to metadata XML) - Maintain consistent formatting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ID entità SP' could be improved to be more natural in Italian. 'ID fornitore di servizi' or 'Identificativo fornitore di servizi' would be more commonly used and understood in a technical context, especially regarding Single Sign-On.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID fornitore di servizi (Identificativo fornitore di servizi)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'link to metadata XML' is missing the translation for 'link'. It should be 'collegamento ai metadati XML'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: collegamento ai metadati XML

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "メタデータXMLへのリンク" is a very literal translation. A more natural Japanese phrasing would be more appropriate in a UI context. The original English describes a link *to* metadata XML.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: メタデータXMLへのリンク (リンク先: メタデータXML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes parentheses around the entire phrase, which might be visually awkward. It's unclear if this was intentional to match the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the parentheses if they are not required for stylistic reasons.  Alternatively, ensure parentheses are consistently used in all related translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'SP entītijas ID' is a literal translation of 'SP Entity Id'. While understandable, 'SP entītātes ID' would be a more accurate and natural-sounding translation of 'Entity' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP entītātes ID

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '(saite uz metadatu XML)' is grammatically correct, but a colon or dash might improve readability and flow with the preceding 'ID' part.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP entītātes ID: saite uz metadatu XML

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ID da Entidade PS (ligar ao XML com os metadados)' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'SP Entity Id (link to metadata XML)'. 'PS' is an abbreviation not commonly used in Portuguese. 'Ligar ao XML com os metadados' is overly literal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID da Entidade SP (link para o XML de metadados)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses usage is not optimal. It's better to use 'para' instead of 'de' to show the connection between 'ID' and the XML.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID da Entidade SP (link para o XML de metadados)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'SP Entity Id' is best translated as 'ID entitate furnizor de servicii' or 'Identificator entitate furnizor de servicii'. The current translation, while understandable, lacks the typical technical precision.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Identificator entitate furnizor de servicii' for a more precise translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the inclusion of '(linkul spre fișerul de metadate XML)' is a bit clunky and might benefit from a more integrated phrasing. It feels like an afterthought.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider incorporating the link information more elegantly, such as 'ID entitate furnizor de servicii (link către fișierul XML cu metadate)' or 'ID entitate furnizor de servicii - link către fișierul XML cu metadate'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the Russian translation creates a slightly awkward phrasing. It's technically correct, but less natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Идентификатор сущности поставщика сервиса (ссылка на XML-файл метаданных)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'SP හැඳු. (පාරදත්ත XML වෙත සබැඳියි)' while conveying a general meaning, isn't the most accurate translation of 'SP Entity Id (link to metadata XML)'. 'හැඳු' is a shortened form and 'සබැඳියි' is a literal translation of 'link' which is less natural. A more natural phrasing might include 'SP අනන්‍ය හැඳුම් අංකය (පාරදත්ත XML ගොනුවට සලකුණු කිරීම)'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP අනන්‍ය හැඳුම් අංකය (පාරදත්ත XML ගොනුවට සලකුණු කිරීම)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parenthetical explanation '(පාරදත්ත XML වෙත සබැඳියි)' is technically correct, but it might benefit from a more standard format for Sinhala documentation. A full stop at the end of the primary translation would be common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP අනන්‍ය හැඳුම් අංකය (පාරදත්ත XML ගොනුවට සලකුණු කිරීම).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is understandable, 'SP entity ID' is more naturally rendered as 'Identifikátor SP entity' in Slovak. 'SP entity ID' feels like a transliteration rather than a proper translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identifikátor SP entity (odkaz na metadáta XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'SP ID entitete' is not the most accurate translation of 'SP Entity Id'. 'Entitete' is the plural form of 'entiteta'. It should be 'entiteta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP ID entiteta (povezava do meta podatkov XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ID' should be capitalized as 'Id'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Id entiteta (povezava do meta podatkov XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "link" as "линк" is a transliteration, not a true translation. A more appropriate Serbian (Cyrillic) word would be "веза" or "путања".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Entitet ID (веза ка метаподацима XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, using parentheses around "веза" would maintain the original formatting more closely. Alternatively, a dash or colon could be used depending on preference.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Entitet ID (веза до метаподацима XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Entitet' is not the most natural translation of 'Entity' in this context. 'Entitet' is more formal and less commonly used in this technical setting. 'Identitet' would be a more appropriate translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Identitet ID (link ka metapodacima XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses placement 'ka metapodacima' can be improved for better readability. It should be placed closer to the 'link' word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Identitet ID (link do metapodacima XML)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Varlık Kimliği' while technically correct, could be improved for clarity and consistency with common terminology. 'Varlık ID' would be a more standard and easily understood term in Turkish IT contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Varlık ID (meta veri XML bağlantısı)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses around 'meta veri XML bağlantısı' feels slightly awkward. A colon or hyphen might read more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Varlık ID: meta veri XML bağlantısı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'посилання' is generally correct but 'посилання на' is slightly more idiomatic for indicating a link or reference.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: посилання на XML-файл метаданих

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, consider adding a hyphen to 'XML-файл' for consistency with the English version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: XML-файл метаданих

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "(liên kết đến siêu dữ liệu XML)" is a literal translation of "(link to metadata XML)". While technically correct, it might be more natural to say something like "(liên kết tới tệp XML siêu dữ liệu)" or "(đường dẫn đến tệp XML siêu dữ liệu)" to convey the meaning more clearly in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: (liên kết tới tệp XML siêu dữ liệu)
